name: ＨＥＡＲＴＡＣＨＥ
description:
Welcome to HEARTACHE, my new horror experience direct from the "ill mind" who produced "A Turtle In A Hare Machine" years ago!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You wake up in a place you don't know, you don't remember anything.

But around you there are so many corpses, all torn to pieces by someone, the walls are full of blood. Start fearing that you are the next victim, and you begin to move in the labyrinth of tunnel of what looks like an old abandoned mine.  
You will soon discover that you are not alone. An old chainsaw still in operation was left on purpose by someone, perhaps the same person who carried out the massacre ...

Now it's up to you to survive!

---CONTROLS----

Simply use "WASD" to move and "Mouse Axis" to Look around (where is possible)
